other_tests.findings: Wall edema and fat stranding surrounding the distal ileum, terminal ileum, and inferomedial aspect of the cecal base with associated phlegmonous changes. Total extent of phlegmonous change measures approximately 4.5 x 4 cm at the level of the cecal base. A punctate 0.6 cm T2 and T1 hypointense lesion within the phlegmonous changes/cecal base consistent with an appendicolith.
